def_cn: 忠实的;忠诚的;忠贞不渝的
def_en: Someone who is faithful to a person, organization, idea, or activity remains firm in their belief in them or support for them.

def_cn: (对丈夫、妻子或恋人)忠诚的，忠贞的
def_en: Someone who is faithful to their husband, wife, or lover does not have a sexual relationship with anyone else.

def_cn: (宗教的)忠实信徒，虔诚信徒
def_en: The faithful are the group of people who believe in a particular religion.

def_cn: (叙述、翻译或抄本)如实的，忠实原文的
def_en: A faithful account, translation, or copy of something represents or reproduces the original accurately.

def_cn: (尤指值得信赖的)旧有物品，老牌产品
def_en: You can refer to something that has been used or has existed for a long time as an old faithful, especially when it is something you can rely on.
